titleStmt.title: Musik til Adam Oehlenschlägers skuespil "Hagbarth og Signe"

work.title: Musik til Adam Oehlenschlägers skuespil "Hagbarth og Signe"
Music for Adam Oehlenschläger's Play 'Hagbarth and Signe'

history.p: The music for Hagbarth og Signe was composed at the time when Carl Nielsen was working on his third symphony (CNW 27). The extent of the music was larger than he originally had planned, and he worked on finishing it until a week before the first performance.

incipText.p: Du, som din Bolig har imellem Skjolde
Nu Maanen gennem Mulmet saa mægtigt bryder
Min Hjælm er mig for blank og tung

titlePage.label: Title page
titlePage.p: Til Vennerne / MARIE OG HOTHER PLOUG / TERNERNES / DANS / AF / HAGBARTH / OG / SIGNE / MUSIK / af / CARL NIELSEN / FORLÆGGERENS EJENDOM FOR ALLE LANDE. / KJØBENHAVN & LEIPZIG. / WILHELM HANSEN, MUSIK-FORLAG. / KRISTIANIA. NORSK MUSIK-FORLAG. / (BRØDRENE HALS-WARMUTH-WILHELM HANSEN)
